<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable / disable reload when magazine is empty.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''enableReload''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicle [[enableReload]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[reloadEnabled]], [[reload]], [[needReload]]
</value></part></template>
